article: Do you know your grandparents? Are they  _  ?  _  people in Yangzhou are happy. In the morning you can see old people play sports in the park. Mr. and Mrs. Chan  _  always in them. They say they are also  _  after their sons and daughters go to work and grandchildren go to school. Mrs. Chan is in a Yang Opera club .  _  she learns to sing the opera in the  _  . It's really interesting. Mr. Chan is in a(n)  _  club. There he can run, swim and  _  ball games. Their friends Mr. and Mrs. Zhang aren't in  _  clubs. They play computer games at  _  because they want to  _  more about their grandchildren. Their grandchildren all love  _  very much. These days some old people want  to have  a shopping club. In the club they can  talk  about how to buy things at a  _  price. How happy the old people in Yangzhou are!
